column2: an A.M. Eatery////I ordered half Benny
column3: half French Toast! I love that they allow that
column4: but it's not on the menu
column5: I just asked and he said yes! So I ordered the Late Harvest Benny and the French Toast Neat
column6: but they kept bringing me the Drunken Monkey! I mean they finally got it right and took it off my tab
column7: but I would rather have just got the right meal. No biggie
column8: I don't mind a free meal.
